name: The Fool
upright: New beginnings, innocence, free spirit, spontaneity.
reversed: Recklessness, being easily distracted, fear of change, poor planning.

name: The Magician
upright: Manifestation, power, resourcefulness, inspired action.
reversed: Manipulation, poor use of talent, illusion, deception.

name: The High Priestess
upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, mystery, subconscious mind.
reversed: Hidden agendas, repressed feelings, secrets revealed.

name: The Empress
upright: Fertility, nurturing, abundance, beauty, nature.
reversed: Overindulgence, creative block, dependence on others.

name: The Emperor
upright: Authority, structure, stability, control, father figure.
reversed: Domination, rigidity, control issues, abuse of power.

name: The Hierophant
upright: Tradition, conformity, spiritual guidance, institutions.
reversed: Rebellion, unconventionality, new approaches, personal beliefs.

name: The Lovers
upright: Union, partnership, choice, alignment of values.
reversed: Disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values, breaking up.

name: The Chariot
upright: Willpower, victory, determination, control, movement.
reversed: Lack of control, scattered direction, opposition, self-discipline issues.

name: Strength
upright: Courage, inner strength, compassion, influence.
reversed: Weakness, self-doubt, lack of self-control, giving up.

name: The Hermit
upright: Introspection, solitude, search for self, inner guidance.
reversed: Loneliness, isolation, withdrawal, being lost or misguided.

name: Wheel of Fortune
upright: Cycles, destiny, turning point, good luck, inevitable change.
reversed: Bad luck, unexpected downturn, external forces, lack of control.

name: Justice
upright: Fairness, truth, law, cause and effect, clarity.
reversed: Unfairness, legal issues, dishonesty, avoiding accountability.

name: The Hanged Man
upright: Surrender, new perspective, sacrifice, letting go.
reversed: Stalling, resistance, martyrdom, fear of sacrifice.

name: Death
upright: Ending, transformation, transition, spiritual awakening.
reversed: Stagnation, resisting change, fear of moving on.

name: Temperance
upright: Balance, moderation, patience, harmony, purpose.
reversed: Extremes, imbalance, discord, conflicting interests.

name: The Devil
upright: Bondage, materialism, shadow self, addiction, restrictions.
reversed: Freedom, breaking bonds, detachment, reclaiming power.

name: The Tower
upright: Sudden change, destruction, upheaval, awakening, chaos.
reversed: Averting disaster, fear of change, personal transformation.

name: The Star
upright: Hope, inspiration, serenity, spiritual renewal.
reversed: Despair, faithlessness, discouragement, feeling lost.

name: The Moon
upright: Illusion, subconscious, intuition, fear, hidden things.
reversed: Confusion, released fear, clear perception, truth revealed.

name: The Sun
upright: Success, joy, vitality, enlightenment, celebration.
reversed: Temporary cloudiness, lack of enthusiasm, unrealistic expectations.

name: Judgement
upright: Absolution, rebirth, inner calling, reflection, accounting.
reversed: Self-doubt, refusal to let go, ignoring the call, unjust criticism.

name: The World
upright: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel, fulfillment.
reversed: Incompletion, lack of closure, limitations, delay.

name: Ace of Wands
upright: Inspiration, new ideas, potential, a spark of creation, growth.
reversed: A lack of motivation, delays, creative block, misdirected energy.

name: Two of Wands
upright: Future planning, decisions, leaving home, personal power.
reversed: Fear of the unknown, lack of planning, delayed projects.

name: Three of Wands
upright: Expansion, foresight, overseas trade, viewing the horizon.
reversed: Obstacles, delays to travel, feeling restricted, missed opportunities.

name: Four of Wands
upright: Celebration, harmony, homecomings, stable foundations.
reversed: Temporary instability, transition, unharmonious home life.

name: Five of Wands
upright: Competition, minor conflicts, disagreements, differences in opinion.
reversed: Conflict avoidance, inner conflict, compromise, seeking peace.

name: Six of Wands
upright: Victory, success, public recognition, self-confidence.
reversed: Egotism, missed victory, fall from grace, lack of recognition.

name: Seven of Wands
upright: Challenge, defense, standing your ground, courage.
reversed: Giving up, feeling overwhelmed, too many enemies, exhaustion.

name: Eight of Wands
upright: Speed, action, air travel, swift change, movement.
reversed: Delays, resisting change, frustration, slow progress.

name: Nine of Wands
upright: Resilience, stamina, boundaries, final reserves of strength.
reversed: Defensiveness, paranoia, exhaustion, lingering trauma.

name: Ten of Wands
upright: Burden, responsibility, hard work, carrying a heavy load.
reversed: Avoiding responsibility, stress relief, delegation, collapse.

name: Page of Wands
upright: Messenger, excitement, new passions, exploration, free spirit.
reversed: New ideas are delayed, fear of failure, impatience, bad news.

name: Knight of Wands
upright: Action, passion, adventure, energy, impetuousness.
reversed: Impatience, recklessness, delays, temperamental behavior.

name: Queen of Wands
upright: Daring, confident, social, vivacious, attractive.
reversed: Egotistical, demanding, jealous, overbearing.

name: King of Wands
upright: Natural-born leader, visionary, entrepreneurial, honor.
reversed: Tyrannical, ruthless, dictatorial, overly aggressive.

name: Ace of Cups
upright: New emotional beginning, intuition, deep feelings, overflowing joy.
reversed: Emotional block, intuition denied, repressed feelings, disappointment.

name: Two of Cups
upright: Union, partnership, love, mutual respect, connection.
reversed: Broken union, imbalance in a relationship, discord, lack of harmony.

name: Three of Cups
upright: Celebration, friendship, community, joyful gathering, harvest.
reversed: Overindulgence, gossip, solitude, betrayed trust.

name: Four of Cups
upright: Apathy, discontent, boredom, feeling withdrawn, missed opportunities.
reversed: Re-evaluation, choosing happiness, accepting an invitation, clarity.

name: Five of Cups
upright: Loss, grief, regret, emotional disappointment, focusing on what is missing.
reversed: Acceptance, moving on, recovery from loss, finding peace.

name: Six of Cups
upright: Nostalgia, childhood memories, innocence, reunion, gifts.
reversed: Stuck in the past, immaturity, moving forward, independence.

name: Seven of Cups
upright: Fantasy, wishful thinking, illusion, choices, scattered vision.
reversed: Focus, determination, choosing a path, clarity of purpose.

name: Eight of Cups
upright: Abandonment, walking away, spiritual journey, deep introspection.
reversed: Stagnation, fear of movement, avoiding necessary change.

name: Nine of Cups
upright: Wishes fulfilled, satisfaction, emotional contentment, luxury.
reversed: Greed, dissatisfaction, temporary happiness, wish denied.

name: Ten of Cups
upright: Perfect harmony, joy, family, lasting happiness, emotional security.
reversed: Broken home, relationship discord, lack of fulfillment, conflict.

name: Page of Cups
upright: Creative opportunity, emotional message, gentle curiosity, sensitive soul.
reversed: Emotional immaturity, creative block, bad news, clinging to fantasy.

name: Knight of Cups
upright: Romance, charm, proposal, imagination, bringing emotions into a situation.
reversed: Moodiness, jealousy, disappointment, unrealistic outlook.

name: Queen of Cups
upright: Compassionate, intuitive, emotional, loving, psychic abilities.
reversed: Overly emotional, martyrdom, dependency, co-dependency.

name: King of Cups
upright: Emotional balance, compassion, diplomacy, calm and control.
reversed: Manipulation, emotional volatility, mood swings, dishonesty.

name: Ace of Swords
upright: Breakthroughs, mental clarity, new ideas, victory, sharp intellect.
reversed: Confusion, mental block, misuse of power, chaotic thoughts.

name: Two of Swords
upright: Stalemate, difficult choice, indecision, avoiding the truth.
reversed: Release, information overload, confusion, a smaller truth revealed.

name: Three of Swords
upright: Heartbreak, emotional pain, sorrow, grief, separation.
reversed: Recovery, releasing pain, optimism, forgiveness, reconciliation.

name: Four of Swords
upright: Rest, recuperation, contemplation, retreat, relaxation.
reversed: Restlessness, burnout, waking up, deep stagnation.

name: Five of Swords
upright: Conflict, tension, loss, defeat, 'winning' at any cost.
reversed: Making amends, sweeping conflict under the rug, unresolved issues.

name: Six of Swords
upright: Transition, moving on, rite of passage, leaving behind difficulty.
reversed: Stuck in the past, emotional baggage, resisting transition.

name: Seven of Swords
upright: Betrayal, deception, trickery, getting away with something.
reversed: Coming clean, mental confusion, confession, acting with integrity.

name: Eight of Swords
upright: Restriction, self-imposed limitation, feeling trapped, victim mentality.
reversed: Releasing self-imposed limitations, finding freedom, new perspective.

name: Nine of Swords
upright: Anxiety, worry, nightmares, fear, despair, mental anguish.
reversed: Releasing worry, coming to terms with fear, deep secrets, recovery.

name: Ten of Swords
upright: Endings, betrayal, irreparable loss, hitting rock bottom.
reversed: Recovery, regeneration, surviving a disaster, avoiding an end.

name: Page of Swords
upright: New ideas, curiosity, mental energy, youthful enthusiasm, truth-seeking.
reversed: Hasty speech, all talk and no action, impatience, scattered energy.

name: Knight of Swords
upright: Ambitious, action-oriented, driven to succeed, rushing forward, intensity.
reversed: Impulsiveness, poor judgment, aggression, thoughtless action.

name: Queen of Swords
upright: Clear thinking, impartial judgment, sharp wit, independent.
reversed: Overly critical, emotionally distant, manipulative, bitter.

name: King of Swords
upright: Intellectual power, authority, truth, clear communication, discipline.
reversed: Cold, tyrannical, abusive power, emotional rigidity.

name: Ace of Pentacles
upright: New financial opportunity, prosperity, material stability, security.
reversed: Lost opportunity, lack of planning, missed chance for money or growth.

name: Two of Pentacles
upright: Balancing resources, prioritizing, flexibility, managing change.
reversed: Imbalance, financial chaos, over-commitment, poor prioritization.

name: Three of Pentacles
upright: Teamwork, collaboration, recognized talents, mastery, execution.
reversed: Mismatched talents, poor quality work, lack of harmony in a group.

name: Four of Pentacles
upright: Security, stability, hoarding, control, possessiveness.
reversed: Releasing control, generosity, financial openness, spending recklessly.

name: Five of Pentacles
upright: Need, poverty, insecurity, illness, feeling left out.
reversed: Recovery from loss, spiritual poverty, improved circumstances, charity.

name: Six of Pentacles
upright: Generosity, charity, sharing wealth, balanced giving and receiving.
reversed: Debt, selfishness, demanding charity, unbalanced finances.

name: Seven of Pentacles
upright: Investment, patience, long-term vision, waiting for the harvest.
reversed: Wasted effort, lack of progress, impatience, poor investment.

name: Eight of Pentacles
upright: Apprenticeship, diligence, focused effort, mastery, skill development.
reversed: Perfectionism, lack of focus, uninspired work, quick-money schemes.

name: Nine of Pentacles
upright: Luxury, financial independence, self-sufficiency, material comfort.
reversed: Loss of security, reckless spending, false independence, theft.

name: Ten of Pentacles
upright: Wealth, lasting security, family inheritance, legacy, established order.
reversed: Financial failure, family conflict, short-term focus, fractured lineage.

name: Page of Pentacles
upright: New financial opportunity, ambition, learning, practicality, focus.
reversed: Lack of focus, financial instability, missed opportunity, laziness.

name: Knight of Pentacles
upright: Hard work, responsibility, reliability, commitment, patience.
reversed: Laziness, obsession with work, dullness, stagnation, routine.

name: Queen of Pentacles
upright: Nurturing, practical, financially secure, down-to-earth.
reversed: Self-centered, possessive, smothering, poor money management.

name: King of Pentacles
upright: Abundance, stability, leadership, business acumen, reliable provider.
reversed: Greed, excess, corruption, overly materialistic, financial disaster.
